physical_appearance: "The image displays a memorandum. It is rectangular in shape and there is a round purple stamp at its right side. Most of the words have already faded from the memorandum. At the top of the memo, ""Food Control Dept Singapore"" can be discerned. ""21.10.46"" is stated at the right hand side of the memo. The ration card has been signed as well
title_text: Memo from the Food Control Department Singapore addressed to Mdm Wong Lai Tuan
